topics: Our organizational structure emphasizes clear reporting lines while fostering collaboration across functional areas. Each VP leads a specialized domain with dedicated teams.
The flat hierarchy enables rapid decision-making and direct communication between leadership and individual contributors. Team leads have autonomy within strategic guardrails.

explanatory_text: Our organizational structure emphasizes clear reporting lines while fostering collaboration across functional areas. Each VP leads a specialized domain with dedicated teams.
The flat hierarchy enables rapid decision-making and direct communication between leadership and individual contributors. Team leads have autonomy within strategic guardrails.
Regular cross-functional meetings ensure alignment on company goals while maintaining accountability within each vertical function.
